name: Blackport
tagline: This project is to serves as a platform in aid of developing the skills required to pass 70-480! The project provides the means for an adult with parental responsibilities over a child to distribute spending money (allowance) whilst instilling the child with a good solid work ethic from an early age. The project also helps parental users to get the kids to muck in abit and manage the running of the house through chores.
body:
### Welcome to the Blackport project.
This project Allows users with parental responsibility's over Children to distribute the responsibilities of a household to their children. The system aims to allow said users' the ability to create chores/tasks to be performed by the dependent user (child/teenager), to earn rewards. The Project will also provide the dependent user with a means to manage their own income, in a simple way, and spend the income via request to the parental user to make automated purchases via third party services, such as- iTunes, Microsoft Store, Microsoft Points, Amazon, Netflix etc...:

```
$ cd JTGrime/Blackport
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Why?
This project serves to allow a platform to develop against client's (UI) via use of technologies investigated by the Microsoft 70-480 certification exam. My aim is to provide a rich unique framework to provide a new and interesting ways to allow modern technology to integrate with our daily live's, and not I'm a gimmicky/gizmo sorta' way! Simple, Free tools which enrich our lives.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
